components/products/product-view-css:
<style>
    /* Only affects the cloned warranty item */
    .new-warranty-override {
        display: flex !important;
        align-items: center !important;
        justify-content: center !important;
        gap: 15px !important;

    }


    /* Optional: fine-tune just the image inside the clone */
    .new-warranty-override img {
        width: 48px !important;
        height: 48px !important;
        margin-top: 20px;

    }

    /* Optional: text styling for the clone only */
    .new-warranty-override span {
        font-weight: bold;
        font-size: 20px !important;
        color: #333;
    }

    @media (min-width: 768px) {
        .new-warranty-override {
            padding-top: 1%;
            width: 20rem;
            height: 6rem !important;
        }

        .new-warranty-override span {
            font-weight: bold !important;
            font-size: 40px !important;
            color: #333;
        }


    }


    @media (max-width: 426px) {
        .new-warranty-override {
            width: 24rem !important;
        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 376px) {
        .new-warranty-override {
            width: 21rem !important;


        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 320px) {
        .new-warranty-override {
            width: 18rem !important;


        }
    }

    @media (max-width: 768px) {
        .new-warranty-override {
            width: 24rem;
            height: 5rem !important;
            padding-bottom: 6%;
        }

        .new-warranty-override span {
            font-weight: bold !important;
            font-size: 40px !important;
            color: #333;
        }
    }




    .custom-buttons-container {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 12px;
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 300px;
        margin: 20px 0;
    }

    .btn-download-spec {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 5px;
        padding: 12px 20px;
        background: transparent;
        color: #EF3826;
        border: 2px solid #EF3826;
        border-radius: 5px;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 18px;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-family: 'helvetic-regular';
        transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
        cursor: pointer;
        text-align: center;
        min-height: 45px;
        line-height: 100%;
    }

    .btn-download-spec:hover {
        background: #EF3826;
        color: white;
        transform: translateY(-1px);
        box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(229, 62, 62, 0.3);
    }

    .btn-download-spec:active {
        transform: translateY(0);
        box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(229, 62, 62, 0.3);
    }

    /* Add download icon using ::before pseudo-element */
    .btn-download-spec::before {

        font-size: 16px;
        font-weight: bold;
    }

    .btn-contact-us {
        display: inline-flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
        gap: 6px;
        padding: 12px 20px;
        background: #EF3826;
        color: white;
        border: 2px solid #EF3826;
        border-radius: 5px;
        text-decoration: none;
        font-size: 18px;
        font-weight: 700;
        font-family: 'helvetic-regular';
        transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
        cursor: pointer;
        text-align: center;
        min-height: 45px;
        line-height: 100%;


    }

    .btn-contact-us:hover {
        background: #d53e3e;
        border-color: #c53030;
        transform: translateY(-1px);
        text-decoration: none !important;
        color: white !important;
        /* Removes underline */

        /* box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(197, 48, 48, 0.3); */
    }

    .btn-contact-us:active {
        transform: translateY(0);
        text-decoration: none !important;


    }

    /* Add phone icon using ::before pseudo-element */
    .btn-contact-us::before {
        text-decoration: none;
        /* Removes underline */

        font-size: 16px;
    }

    /* Responsive adjustments */
    @media (max-width: 480px) {
        .custom-buttons-container {
            max-width: 100%;
            gap: 10px;
        }

        .btn-download-spec,
        .btn-contact-us {
            padding: 10px 16px;
            font-size: 18px;
            min-height: 40px;
        }

        .btn-download-spec::before,
        .btn-contact-us::before {
            font-size: 14px;
        }
    }

    /* Focus states for accessibility */


    /* Ensure proper link styling */
    .btn-download-spec:visited {
        text-decoration: none;
    }

    .btn-download-spec {
        color: #e53e3e;
    }

    .productView-img-container {
        aspect-ratio: 4 / 3;
        /* or adjust this according to your real image size */
        width: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
        background: white;
        /* optional: prevent white flicker during lazyload */
    }

    .productView-img-container img {
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        object-fit: contain;
    }

    .slick-list {
        height: 100%;
    }

    /* last seen widget collapse */

    .wrap-icons.collapsed {
        display: none;
    }

    .expand {
        display: none;
    }


    .lst-seen-widget .is-show-widget {
        display: none;
    }

    .jdgm-widget.jdgm-widget {
        display: flex;
        flex-direction: row-reverse;
        justify-content: flex-end;
    }

    .jdgm-rev-widg.jdgm-rev-widg {
        display: block;
        clear: both;
        width: 100%;
    }

    .btn-download-spec:focus {
        color: #e53e3e !important;
    }

    .btn-download-spec:hover {
        color: white !important;
    }

    .self-product-detail{
        display: flex; 
        align-items: center;
    }

    @media (max-width: 570px) {
        .justify-content-space-btw-mb{
            justify-content: space-between;
        }
    }
    
</style>
